bibl.title: Some Interesting Morphological Phenomena in the Language of the Papyri.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Gignac, Francis T.

bibl.note: Preview of some of the more interesting discoveries made in the preparation of the second volume of the Grammar of the Greek Papyri of the Roman and Byzantine Periods.
bibl.seg: Gignac Francis T., Some Interesting Morphological Phenomena in the Language of the Papyri.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 199-207.
